name: netnerds
title: NetNerds
description: Shows really cool stats about your internet connection
author: ajayguru

commands.name: net
commands.title: Network Stats
commands.subtitle: View Internet Connection Stats
commands.description: Shows detailed network statistics including speed, latency, and connection type

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
